title: You can't eat this Keyboard!!!  - CandyBar Premium
description: Candy just got better with the CandyBar premium keyboard! Custom keyboards are the next big thing for PC enthusiasts, move aside RGB!  Sign up for The Key Dot Co's newsletter to find out when the CandyBar is back in stock!   Buy Mechanical Keyboard On Amazon (Paid Link):  On BHPhoto (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):   Buy Mechanical Keyboard Switches On Amazon (Paid Link):  On Newegg (Paid Link):   Buy Keyboard Tools On Amazon (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):   Buy Keyboard Cleaning Tools On Amazon (Paid Link):  On BHPhoto (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
